title: Nature Domain
content:
Choose one from the Feats list Level 10 - Divine Intervention (Class Feature) Level 12 - Feat - Choose one from the Feats list

BG3 Nature DOMAIN PROGRESSION

By selecting the Nature Domain Cleric subclass you'll also gain access to:

Level 1 - Domain Spells (Speak with Animals, Animal Friendship) Level 1 - Acolyte of Nature (Subclass Feature) Level 2 - Charm Animals and Plants (Action) Level 3 - Domain Spells (Spike Growth, Barkskin) Level 5 - Domain Spells (Plant Growth, Sleet Storm) Level 6 -
